userHistory.title: multicategory Variety Store
userHistory.description: As customer of a variety store, I want to access a catalog that includes line white, ropa, electrónica, belleza, mueblería, juguetería, deportes y librería para adquirir todo lo que necesito en un solo lugar.
acceptanceCriteria: The store must displaye a main menu with all categories .
Each category must have products organiez and filterable by price,brand, and popularity.
The customer can add products from different categories to the same cart.
The system must display promotions or discounts specific to ach category.
Different payment methods must be offered.
The customer can choose between home delivey or in-store pickup.
The system must generate a receipt with the customers information and the purchased products.
